statusText.agentFacingText:
Effective 7/1 Elpha Secure ("Elpha") is AXIS' solution for stand-alone primary cyber insurance for US-domiciled businesses up to $100m in revenue, only available via a wholesale distribution channel. https://www.elphasecure.com/for-brokers 

Wholesale partners please send new business submissions directly to axis-submissions@elphasecure.com 

Retail partners, please direct new business submissions to Elpha through a wholesale provider to axis-submissions@elphasecure.com
